security_audit.summary: This is a pure narrative/prompt-based skill with no executable code, network calls, file access, or external commands. It contains only story content and character dialogue for an interactive fiction game.

content.value_statement: Step into the shoes of astronaut Stella Chen as she establishes a research station on the alien planet Gaia. This interactive narrative chapter lets you guide her scientific discoveries and share in the joy of systematic exploration.
actual_capabilities: Interactive dialogue with astronaut Stella Chen
Participate in discovery of plant communication
Help establish research protocols on Gaia
limitations: No actual scientific data or calculations

use_cases.title: Explore alien ecosystems
use_cases.description: Experience the thrill of discovering alien plant life and uncovering their unique properties through systematic observation.

use_cases.title: Guide scientific discoveries
use_cases.description: Help Stella design experiments, analyze samples, and make breakthrough discoveries about Gaia's ecosystem.

use_cases.title: Experience daily astronaut life
use_cases.description: Share in the intellectual satisfaction of conducting proper scientific research millions of miles from Earth.

prompt_templates.title: Start the chapter
prompt_templates.prompt: I'm ready to help Stella establish her research station. What does she need to set up first?

prompt_templates.title: Guide sample collection
prompt_templates.prompt: What type of samples should Stella collect today? Should we focus on plants, minerals, or something else?

prompt_templates.title: Analyze discoveries
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella found something interesting in her analysis. How should she interpret these results?

prompt_templates.title: Plan future research
prompt_templates.prompt: Based on today's findings, what experiments should Stella design for tomorrow?

best_practices: Engage with Stella's scientific curiosity and ask questions about her methods
Encourage systematic data collection and careful observation
Help her develop hypotheses based on her findings
anti_patterns: Don't rush through the narrative - enjoy the slower, methodical pacing
Avoid unrealistic scientific suggestions that break the story's immersion
Don't ignore Stella's emotional journey as she reconnects with her scientific identity

faq.question: Is this real scientific research?
faq.answer: No, this is interactive fiction. Stella is a fictional character and her discoveries are part of a story.

faq.question: Can I perform actual experiments?
faq.answer: The skill provides narrative descriptions of experiments and discoveries, but no real scientific functionality.

faq.question: How long is this chapter?
faq.answer: This chapter typically takes 25-30 minutes to complete, focusing on Stella's systematic research activities.

faq.question: Do I need science knowledge?
faq.answer: No scientific background required. The story explains concepts through Stella's perspective in accessible language.

faq.question: Can I save my progress?
faq.answer: Progress is maintained within your conversation history. Each chapter can be experienced independently.

faq.question: Is this part of a larger story?
faq.answer: Yes, this is chapter 11 of 'Whispers from the Star', but each chapter can be enjoyed separately.
